Room.Name: Delaney Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Delaney drive between the Oceancrest Municipal Library on the east side of the road, and the Oceancrest City Guard Barracks on the west.
Room.LongDescription: Knowledge is essential to all societies, and making knowledge public strengthens the society. The Municipal Library is nothing compared to the University Library or the Ministry of Knowledge, but it does provide the average citizens of Oceancrest with basic knowledge about whatever they might be interested in.
